description: This table contains basic information about a treatment plan or a pathway, such as the plan/pathway name, the user who created the plan/pathway, when it was created, which protocol it was created from, the starting cycle number or step, etc.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan ID.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: PLAN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the treatment plan in this row, for example Active or Inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Future

columns.name: PLAN_REC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record type of the treatment plan in this row, for example Treatment Plan or Simple Plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Treatment Plan


Pathway


Surgical Plan


Simple Plan


Therapy Plan


Dental Treatment


Dental Parent Treatment


BMT Plan

columns.name: PLAN_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date in external format of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: ZERO_BASED_YN
columns.description:
The yes/no flag signaling whether the days start at day 0 or day 1.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PROTOCOL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the protocol that generated the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of the protocol that generated the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: CREATED_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who created the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: CREATED_ON_TM
columns.description: The date/time in external format that the treatment plan in this row was created.

columns.name: PLAN_VERIF_DATE_TM
columns.description: The date/time in external format when the treatment plan in this row was last verified.

columns.name: PLAN_VERIF_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who last verified the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: DC_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for discontinuing the treatment plan in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Linked episode is resolved


Linked episode is deleted


Merge Treatment plan


Discontinued by Contact Mover


Future Plan Deleted


Advanced to Next Plan


Discontinued by Patient Unmerge


Automatically Discontinued - Patient Deceased

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The treatment plan display name entered by the user.

columns.name: FIRST_CYCLE_NUM
columns.description: The cycle number of the first cycle in the treatment plan.

columns.name: START_CYCLE_NUM
columns.description: The cycle number of the cycle marked as the 'start cycle' in the treatment plan.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient who is associated with this treatment plan or pathway.

columns.name: PATHWAY_DISC_RESN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason for discontinuing the pathway. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Discharged

columns.name: REV_NEXT_DUE
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) or treatment number when review reminders begin to display to users.

columns.name: REV_EXPIRES
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) or treatment number after which this plan will be considered unreviewed.

columns.name: TRT_GOAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the treatment goal for the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TPL_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The provider who is managing this treatment plan.

columns.name: PLAN_VERSION
columns.description: Stores the lowest Version in which the plan was edited. This data is used to determine what features will be enabled for the plan.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of a referral which is used for prior authorization.

columns.name: DEVIATION_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who signed off on the treatment plan deviation

columns.name: DEVIATION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the treatment plan was given a signoff for deviation

columns.name: DEVIATION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason to specify why the plan deviation from protocol


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


New study version

columns.name: DEVIATION_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment to give more information about the deviation reason.  This only extracts the first 4000 characters.

columns.name: LAST_DEVIATION_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the plan last deviated from the protocol

columns.name: DEVIATION_REQUESTOR_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who marked the plan as needing approval for deviation

columns.name: NEXT_PLANNED_DATE
columns.description: Next planned treatment date for a plan.

columns.name: INFUSION_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the treatment department.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date real of the protocol that generated the treatment plan in this row.  The contact date real is a unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: HOLD_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when this plan was put on hold, if it is on hold.

columns.name: HOLD_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who put this plan on hold, if it is on hold.

columns.name: HOLD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why this plan was put on hold.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Transfer


Discharge


Admitted with OP day


Not admitted with IP day


Plan Created


Protocol Added


Patient Contact Moved


New study version available


Plan Conversion


New study version available

columns.name: HOLD_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered when this plan was put on hold.

columns.name: PROGRAM_NUMBER
columns.description: This item contains the program number for a treatment plan

columns.name: REGIMEN_NUMBER
columns.description: This item contains the regimen number for a treatment plan

columns.name: LINE_OF_TREATMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the line of treatment for the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


First Line


Second Line


Third Line


Induction


Consolidation


Maintenance


Adjuvant


Neoadjuvant


Test Line

columns.name: PROTOCOL_SUGGESTION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates which type of protocol suggestion, if any, led to the creation of this treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not From Suggested Protocol


Tag


BPA


Research


Pathways


No Suggestions

columns.name: PROTOCOL_LINK_CSN
columns.description: For a treatment plan created from a linked protocol (PTP) record, this column stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the PTP contact linking the clinical protocol contact to a billing protocol contact.

columns.name: CREATION_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the creation status of a therapy plan based on whether the plan or added plan has been signed or activated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Activated


Not Activated


Additional Plan Not Activated

columns.name: STUDY_CURRENT_VERSION_IDENT
columns.description: The current study version identifier of the treatment plan.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_PRIMARY_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the primary coverage ID that is used to generate the Referral in the treatment or therapy plan.

columns.name: BMT_AMEND_USER_ID
columns.description: the user who amended the plan which resulted in the creation of a new treatment plan.

columns.name: BMT_PLAN_AMEND_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the plan was amended.

columns.name: REFERRAL_STATUS_CHNG_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the most recent instant when the treatment plan referral status changed due to changes made to the treatment plan.

columns.name: DISCON_COMMENT
columns.description: It stores the discontinue comments entered by the user.

columns.name: DISCON_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the discontinue plan instant.

columns.name: DISCON_PLAN_USER_ID
columns.description: This item store the user who discontinued the plan.

columns.name: LAST_USER_ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last instant that a user interacted directly with the plan. This item will not be updated when the plan is updated by an action outside the plan or by a background process.

columns.name: RECONCILIATION_EVENT_ID
columns.description: This item contains the ID of the event used to track reconciliation actions for this plan

columns.name: NEEDS_RECONCILIATION_YN
columns.description:
This item contains whether or not the plan needs reconciliation


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ZERO_BASED_YN

columns.name: NEXT_UNAUTH_TREATMENT_DAY_ID
columns.description: This item stores the treatment day ID of the next unauthorized day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: IS_PLAN_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Virtual item that determines if a treatment plan (TPL) has been deleted or not. A treatment plan is considered deleted if it has a discontinued reason (I TPL 120) that's defined as entered in error (I LSD 77800), if it's a dental treatment plan and its status is set to discontinued (I TPL 94004), or if it's a BMT plan and its associated HSB record is deleted (I HSB 50).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ZERO_BASED_YN
